tool_description: Checks the availability and response time of target real estate websites before initiating scraping operations.

website_urls.description: List of real estate website URLs to check

timeout_seconds.description: Maximum time to wait for response in seconds

error_messages: Invalid URL format: Ensure all URLs start with http:// or https:// and are properly formatted.
Timeout too low: timeout_seconds must be at least 5 seconds to allow proper connection.
Too many URLs: Maximum 50 URLs can be checked in a single request.
usage: Provide an array of website URLs to check their availability. Use this before starting any scraping operations to ensure targets are accessible.

response_times.description: Response times in seconds for each website

total_available.description: Number of websites that are currently available
